text: Hi everyone, I am working on an app which needs to manipulate HubDB (specifically, creating tables and add rows). <http://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/hubdb> mentions that POST and PUT requests are available, but when I send requests I always get permission error and it shows that I need  `hubdb-access` permission, even if I supplied an OAuth access token with all scopes in the documentation. Anyone has idea on this? Thanks. :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi <@U2882P664>. Have you checked to see if HubDB is available in the portal you are working in? You should be able to access it via <https://app.HubSpot.com/hubdb/{portalid}>.
Thanks for your reply <@U22PU4G4A> , I tested on our own portal and it already has a few tables created. I can access them via the web UI.
